roleset.name: (cause to) become inconvenienced

role.descr: thing that is inconvenient; (about what) (if separate from arg0)

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Witnesses are often worried about threats and are inconvenienced about appearing in court.

roleset.note: INCONVENIENCE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to 'put_out.14'. (from inconvenience.01-v)

roleset.name: put out, not suited to comfort/needs

role.descr: thing that is inconvenient; (about what) (if separate from arg0)

example.name: nominal rel: inconvenience
example.text: Although other companies pay off the money several times slower than they do -LRB- usually one week -RRB- , for the materials and procedures of the compensation claims , they consider the inconvenience for the car owners , and they are not so strict .

example.name: concatenation of arg0
example.text: In connecting the filter tips to cigarettes , because plastic adheres to knives and is inconvenient to cut , we daub the knives with silicone oil -LRB- another carcinogen

roleset.note: INCONVENIENCE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from inconvenience.01-n)
INCONVENIENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6, relation to convenient.01. (from inconvenient.01-j)
